results.creator_credit: John Shaw, Frank Bagnall and Australian Commonwealth Film Unit
results.brief_description: Official ceremony and celebrations of the independence of Fiji, declared on the 10th October 1970, and the tour of the islands by Prince Charles.

results.title: Independence Day USA
results.creator_credit: John G. Fuller and United States Information Agency
results.brief_description: Describes the various ways in which individual Americans celebrate their Independence Day, July 4th. They honour the heroes responsible for the Declaration of Independence and the national ideals of human rights embodied in it.

results.title: Independence day (Captioned)
results.creator_credit: Roland Emmerich, Dean Devlin and Centropolis Entertainment
results.brief_description: One of the biggest box office hits of all time, this movie delivers the ultimate encounter when aliens launch an invasion against the human race. The spectacle begins when massive spaceships appear. Wonder turns to terror as the ships blast destructive beams of fire down on cities all over the planet. Now the world’s only hope lies with determined survivors, uniting for one last strike against the invaders - before it’s the end of mankind. Cast includes Will Smith, Bill Pullman, Jeff Goldblum and Mary McDonnell.

results.title: Independence Day
results.brief_description: On July 2, a giant alien mothership enters orbit around Earth and deploys several dozen saucer-shaped ‘destroyer’ spacecraft that quickly lay waste to major cities around the planet.

constellations_other.name: Hack the planet
constellations_other.description: How do you represent something that's... kinda boring to look at, like hacking, when you're operating in a visual medium like film, TV and videogames?

results.description: On July 2, a giant alien mothership enters orbit around Earth and deploys several dozen saucer-shaped ‘destroyer’ spacecraft that quickly lay waste to major cities around the planet. On July 3, the United States conducts a coordinated counterattack that fails. On July 4, a plan is devised to gain access to the interior of the alien mothership in space, in order to plant a nuclear missile.
description_for_label: On July 2, a giant alien mothership enters orbit around Earth and deploys several dozen saucer-shaped ‘destroyer’ spacecraft that quickly lay waste to major cities around the planet. On July 4, a plan is devised to gain access to the interior of the alien mothership in space, in order to plant a nuclear missile.

results.title: Indelible impressions
results.brief_description: A family of women – they share pride and a passion for life; a love for dancing, talking and eating and each woman has left an indelible impression on those of the next generation. In this story Jade shares her memories and thoughts with the newest and youngest member in the family, her niece, and poses the question, “Will the women of our family leave an indelible mark on you just as they did on me?”

results.title: Incredible voyage
results.creator_credit: Burton Benjamin, Isaac Kleinerman, CBS News and McGraw-Hill Films
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “21st Century”.
Explores the inside of the human body using an endoscope, a viewing system packaged in a rod, used together with a microscope, x-ray and time-lapse photography. Discusses the medical use of the technique. Narrated by Walter Cronkite.

results.title: Incredible Floridas
results.creator_credit: Peter Weir, Malcolm Otton and Australian Commonwealth Film Unit
results.brief_description: Incredible Floridas is composer Richard Meale’s homage to the French poet, Arthur Rimbaud. Scored for woodwind, percussion and string instruments, it was written for the “Fires of London” and their conductor, Peter Maxwell Davies, and premiered in London in 1971 to a enthusiastic reception. Richard Meale is a leader in contemporary music in Australia. Also available on DVD [319174].

results.title: Increasing productivity and efficiency: setting the right climate
results.creator_credit: Pare Lorentz Jr and BNA Communications
results.brief_description: Delves into teamwork, what it is and is not, how to institute it, the climate in which it flourishes. Portrays a five-point model for critiquing progress and discusses the line manager’s vital role as a paraprofessional trainer.

results.title: Incontinence: a diarrhetic flow of obvious mismatches
results.creator_credit: Manuel De Landa and De Landa
results.brief_description: Experimental film dealing with film editing and the visual image. Contains seven individual sequences of mismatching dialogue/actors/scenes with all scenes based on actual dialogue from “Who’s afraid of Virginia Woolf?”. However, a comic nightmare takes place and a healthy disregard for the text creates quite a bizarre interpretation of this well-known piece of literature. Cast includes Dina Paisner, Ken Burns, Patrick Gerstle, Susan Schneider and others.
